caption.p: In vitro antifungal activity of the four single substances of O. vulgare EO against M. laxa, M. fructicola, and M. fructigena. Bars with different letters indicate mean values significantly different at P < 0.05 according to Tukey test. Data are expressed as mean of three replicates Â± SE. 50, 150, and 250 are the concentrations of each single substance in ppm; PDA is potato dextrose agar.
